metadata.name: TXE-01
metadata.description:
Texture and Process experiment 01:
Using a combination of analogue and digital methods to develop new methods of mark-making.

Perennial Praxis is an experimental project by Jacob Deakin:

'My design practice almost entirely focuses on three core tenants, experimentation, process and texture. Never focusing too much on a final outcome but the methods of getting there; It's exciting to watch a project start from a small idea and flourish into something beautifully unexpected'.
